language.description: API endpoints and hooks to interface with a BardCanvas-based Remote Authentication Server.
language.login_using_rauth: Use your {$server_name} credentials to login.

messages.website_handle_empty: This website handle on the remote authentication server is empty.
messages.website_name_empty: The remote authentication website name is empty.
messages.website_url_empty: The remote authentication website URL is empty.
messages.website_keys_incomplete: The remote authentication website encryption keys are incomplete.
messages.remote_api_error: Can't call to the remote API at %s: %s
messages.remote_api_empty: Nothing has been received from the remote API. Called URL: %s
messages.invalid_api_response: Error: API response is not a valid JSON response: %s. Called URL: %s
messages.invalid_api_object: Error: API response is not a valid JSON object. Called URL: %s
messages.registration_error:
Cannot register the account on %s:
%s
Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact the tech support staff.
messages.null_remote_object:
Cannot continue with account registration: %s has returned an empty object that cannot be handled locally.
Please try again. If the problem persists, please contact the tech support staff.
messages.missing_token: You haven't specified the login token.
messages.invalid_token: Sorry, but the token you've provided is invalid.
messages.token_expired: Sorry, but the token has expired. Click here to login now.
messages.account_unconfirmed:
Sorry, but your account on this website is not confirmed. It seems there has been an issue with the Authentication Server.

Please click here and try to login manually. If the problem persists, please contact us and request for help.
messages.invalid_object_returned: The authentication server returned an invalid object.
messages.no_level_change_allowed: You can't change this user's level on this website. Please do it from the {$server} accounts browser.

specs.description: It should be provided by the rAuth server owner.
